website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quirks, kids will like this basic claw machine that comes with some nice extras.
pros: Offers bright colors and lights that are exciting for kids
Machine has 3 joysticks that are easy to operate
Comes with 30 reusable tokens and 6 plush toys
cons: The claw doesn't have strong gripping power

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: This toy keeps all my kids entertained for hours. You can refill the machine with any small toy, It’s amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kaya

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining kids for hours!
customer_reviews.text: This product is super cool. My kids love it. They sit there and play for hours. The machine is fun to play and made of good quality. Looking forward to many more endless hours of fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Rotem carmel

customer_reviews.title: Drains batteries too fast!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was my batteries at first but even with brand new energizer max, the machine only works for three turns and then dies. It drains power too fast to be useful. It is too bad since when it works, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old LOVES this gift, probably was his favorite! Plays with it about three times a day. I bought extra of the things you put in it, I think they are key chains or just things to clip on something. You can also add other items yourself like rolled up dollars, packaged candy or chocolates, etc. The only improvement needed is the height of the machine. The claw will only open so far down so you cannot overly stuff the machine with items. Otherwise great toy for a 12 year old!
customer_reviews.author: CMJ

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this- even the big ones.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get out of the store without being begged for money for one of these machines and often end up with nothing. The kids loved this. The music is annoying and I thinking of putting tape over the speaker. We were also hunting for things (not candy) to put inside. I would stick to the recommended age of 8 yrs and up.
customer_reviews.author: cindy rider

customer_reviews.title: BEST CLAW MACHINE FOR THE $$
customer_reviews.text: The CLAW arrived in excellent condition. We got this gift for your son for Christmas. We discarded the lil plush toys. We picked up some cheap prizes and put them in the machine. Controls are easy and simple. Music is annoying and the mute button is a must after hearing it play over and over. Ha-ha! All the lights work and give a cool addition to the machine. I recommend using nickels or 5 cent euro coin. The plastics coins do not turn the machine on all the time. Well worth the money and recommend highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! My son loves playing the claw games at restaurants so he was super excited when he got this for Christmas. Works great and it’s not too difficult to pick up the stuffed animals that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: LoLoJMU

customer_reviews.title: More fun than it should be. 😂
customer_reviews.text: It's a mini claw machine. And as a grown adult, I have spent far too much of my day trying to get stuff out of it. The kid loves it. The music has two volume settings, or can be off altogether. It comes with a few stuffies to get started, but there are several inexpensive options (like small squishies) you can find from other sellers. And honestly, most of the little toys she has laying around the house have worked great in it too. Basically, this is more fun than it should be, and suprisingly well done for a tiny machine.
customer_reviews.author: KM in NC

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great as decor for our arcade themed party. My nieces did not stop playing it. Keep refilling with small toys or candies for tons of fun. The coin slot can be tricky but it’s an easy fix to reinsert the coin or if the spring bends from overuse just bend it out gently.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: We got a dud
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of a home claw machine and just knew my 6 year old son would flip when he opened it. (He did!) The arm/chain mechanism was disfunctional from the start and never worked. The claw is supposed to automatically open/close as the claw goes up/down... But ours didn't 😔 Within a few minutes of playing with it to try to get it to work, the chain stopped raising and lowering the claw all together. It's a shame because it seems like a fun toy! Loved the volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Bbsunyea2

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed in this toy! It broke after 8 months of use. We didn't even use it that many times! I would like to talk to customer service and receive a refund or a new one! I tried several new batteries and nothing seems to get this thing to turn on : (
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette S Kiekbusch

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Inop out of the package.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this early for Christmas. Delivered 10/31/2018. Return window closed 11/30/2018. Unit did not work out of the package on Christmas. Claw mechanism does not operate whatsoever. Multiple battery exchanges did not solve the issue. OUT $45 for a toy that cannot be used. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter for christmas works great. BUT when we took it out of box they have a plastic bag on the claw inside machine secured with a twist tie. Lol. Yeah spent 45 mins trying to get bag off threw this tiny hole then twist tie got got stuck in in the claw area. So had to find a small eyeglass screw driver to open top part and get the twist tie out from where it was jammed. BUT over all works great now. picks up Hershey kisses an small candys.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany.w

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Our machine did not come with the coins or plush prizes. and after a day it broke this was terrible does not work good
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kass

customer_reviews.title: Defective and Refunded. Lightweight Play Claw Machine
customer_reviews.text: Returned product as it wouldn’t work once unwrapped and installed three different sets of batteries. If it did work I don’t think it would last long for kids due to quality. This was a gift to my wife who would have been careful with it. We got a refund and the return process was easy. Unfortunately ours was defective. We did not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herbelin

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it, and so do we with the sound off
customer_reviews.text: The sound can be turned off, which is nice, except the sound is the only thing that indicates you're about out of time. But the kids love it. The case inside isn't tall enough to accommodate more than one layer of toys (the claw is too tall to come up high enough with a toy dangling). But all in all, we're glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lindahl

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, great gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect gift for my nieces and nephew! I am so excited to give this for Christmas. It is a lot of fun and I did open it to make sure it works well and it does. The kids will easily be able to get their prizes while still being challenged and have to aim and do it the way the big machines do. Very exciting toy.
customer_reviews.author: oh*mommyme

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my grandson for Christmas, as I was leaving the next day. Doesn’t work at all! My son-in-law finally got it to go up and down, but no left or right movement. Can’t afford to return it. Very sad to get a gift that doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.author: pcolangel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. Sending back.
customer_reviews.text: Product idea is awesome! And our child was waiting for this gift. Yesterday we finally opened it. Unfortunately this claw machine was poorly made, came without batteries (3 D batteries). And at the end it didn’t work. The celebration was ruined. Sending this piece of garbage back. P.S. The funny thing: on the switcher “ON-OFF” instead of “ON” they put “NO”...
customer_reviews.author: Riadh Y. Amari

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 30 minutes on Christmas Day
customer_reviews.text: I should have heeded the reviews but, I thought I'd give it a try. My child loved it while he was able to play with it. Then it stopped working. We did all trouble shooting and even changed batteries but, still nothing. Had to send it back and explain to my child that the "Elves" must have been over worked and forgot to make this toy properly.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Randall

customer_reviews.title: INSERT THE COIN to make it work!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first, it didn’t work since the guid paper was kind of confusing. I sent an email to them because the due date for return was over. They were so flexible and kind to refund my money immediately. I decided to try for the last time so I put the batteries inside and make the machine on again but this time I inserted the coins inside and it worked. Remember! You have to INSERT THE COIN after doing everything else. Really nice customer service. I will pay them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT claw machine
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and was very hesitant to buy any of the claw machines available on Amazon. It's true you can't fill the machine with a lot of items but it works! The claw has to go to the bottom of the machine to open up. It comes with little stuffed toys. Very important*** The music is not overly loud and annoying and can be turned completely off. We bought this for my daughters 7th birthday and she played with it for hours. Everyone from a 7 year old to a 75 year old tried it. Give your kids a break from the screens. Buy a claw machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin K.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money from Etna
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and the chain on the Claw broke the 1st use. Huge waste of money. Sadly very disappointed when I asked for a return and was denied because I was 1 day past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Mollymol

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived but didn't work at all. Had to return it. Complete piece of junk and poorly built. Did not look like picture, very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Can adjust sound.
customer_reviews.text: This product brings back childhood memories. This is not a easy win machine must work for prize. The top doesnt come off so no easy access to prizes for the children. The best option on this parents is the switch that allows you to put sound on low or even off.
customer_reviews.author: Jcall55

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little machine! I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 10year old daughter. She hasn't received it yet but when it arrived I opened it up, put the batteries in and put a few small toys in that I purchased just for the machine. Some small My Little Pony figurines, some Transformers BotBots a rubber duckie and even some jewelry. (Just to give you an idea of some size and weight) it picked everything up beautifully! It's really quite fun even for us parents lol I think it would be great for parties, baby showers ect. Can't wait for her to open it up!
customer_reviews.author: Charli Nieporte

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 light uses
customer_reviews.text: This item broke after 2 uses of very light play. The claw stopped moving to the right, rendering it useless once it was at the far left of the machine. My son was very disappointed as it was his big Christmas gift. Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boys for Christmas. They are 6 & 8. Both love playing it! I enjoyed playing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4-yr-old loves it! It keeps him entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: HUGE hit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons 4th birthday. HUGE hit, a little confusing at first but he figured it out before me. Hold down two of the joysticks at the same time to open the claw. I filled it with small soft toys, candy, and even matchbox cars. It grabbed them all. He's been on it for almost three STRAIGHT hours and the batteries are still going strong. Great way to occupy a child and teach them patience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: This machine is unfortunately not well-made. The claw stopped working and wouldn’t grip after just a few times. Maybe we were just unlucky, but it seems flimsy and I would look for something else instead of buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has always had a "thing" about claw machines, anywhere she finds them. She's having a blast with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Snookie

customer_reviews.title: Fun most have toy
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and most have toy , you can fill it out with candy or other small toys . My 2 year old was very comfortable to play with it .
customer_reviews.author: R. Rabbani

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This machine is garbage. I never write reviews but I thought I would on this so your kid is not super disappointed. It is made of very cheap flimsy plastic. The battery compartment does not stay closed. The claw itself gets jammed up on the way up and down and the claw never opened even on the first use. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Christmases gifting
customer_reviews.text: I will buy again this Christmas. It works so good. You can't have enough. Bought my own candy and batteries last forever
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Centeno

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughters birthday, it broke in the first 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Connie Burns

customer_reviews.title: It's junk
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 year old grandson he was so excited because he loved it. But it only worked for maybe 15 minutes and wouldn't work properly after that. This is a piece of junk and I am so disappointed and my grandson was even more disappointed. I will never purchase another one of these or anything similar to it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry E.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids for Christmas after they were loving playing with one at a friend's house. Unfortunately, within two days the controls stopped working and I had to return it. Seemed very cheap and not worth the $40 I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: KHart

customer_reviews.title: Worked for an hour
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to get this on Xmas probably about the 10 th attempt to use it with in the hour it completely broke! We changed the batteries twice and it doesn’t work. What a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy! My son loves this, he is 8, it was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my son, had other gifts that went with it. Put the batteries in, it didn't work. Not even a little bit. Was a fast process to refund, but just ended up going with a different brand. Hopefully that one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My sons new fave toy- hours and HOURS of fun- peace and quiet for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarantakoss

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: the kid requested a claw machine and I found this little dreamer for a great price! Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Cas

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's great and my kid loves it. A little pain to get inside of it but it's for the kid's enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Radakovich

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This entertained the family for hours at a time. It was a huge hit Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: ferc

customer_reviews.title: grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: fun for the kids to play with--they all have fun

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our grandson, who wanted it, but was disappointed because it only has 6 little stuffed toys in it. I spent a lot of time trying to find things to put in it for him that would fit into the opening provided to get things in to the machine, which is very small!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This is junk! My son was so excited this am to open it from Santa. Only to find out it doesn’t work. Put new batteries in it and no lights, no sound, nothing. The volume button has 3 settings but only moves to one. Don’t buy it. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit! One of the most played with toys I’ve bought for them.
customer_reviews.author: Telisa D. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Kids love IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: KIDS LOVE IT!!!!!!!! Amazing toy me and my daughter played with it for hours and hours!!!! Amazing make sure you have D batteries
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Best game
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece and her dad and my husband had to play with it too. Best family game ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Predmore

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work cheap made
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap made and doesn’t work. My son got it for Christmas and is now disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Nicole Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my grandsons and they loved them. Even the parents enjoyed playing with them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Machine
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mini claw machine.It got two ways charger :battery or USB,quiet save money for the USB. Come with the music when u take it on and amazing to play claw the toys.Not too big but it's the good size for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rigal Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and neither of them worked. My son was very disappointed. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Farley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for very long
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids played with this on Xmas day and a couple times thereafter and then it stopped working. We thought it was the batteries and got the really good batteries and it still won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for about 10 seconds after putting in the batteries and then it never worked again. Have tried different batteries and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made in China
customer_reviews.text: 1st one wouldn't move left or right. Disappointing for a birthday present! Replacement arrived quickly but would not play music. Keeping it figuring the company couldn't do any better.
customer_reviews.author: Zorch

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons ages 10 and 6 had a lot of fun with this claw toy. The reason I picked this one you could adjust the sound. We added some bubble gum, candy and a few dollar bills rolled up for them to win. Very happy with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just gave this to my kids for Christmas and we have tried everything and the claw never opens!! What are we doing wrong? We’ve tried everything it says.......So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: The item doesn't work, it turns on but the grabber doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Pankey

customer_reviews.title: No sound
customer_reviews.text: We put the batteries in.....lights worked but no sound. Just ordered a new one and hope it works right.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Block

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, especially for kids that love playing the real claw machines. I bought one for my daughter and one for a present. Easy to use, but don’t put too big of toys in there.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s too small to really operate like a real crane game.
customer_reviews.author: Nan12

customer_reviews.title: Chain Messed Up On Claw
customer_reviews.text: The chain on the claw stopped moving up and down a month after bought and played a few times. It was a nice claw machine otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Haley B

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthless. It didn't work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! Got as a Christmas gift and he really enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Fredenburg

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this item the instructions were not clear; it took them an hour to set up and then the claw would not open; after all of that they had hours of fun; I give it a 4.5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lay-Choon Khoo

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk!! Bought for a Christmas gift. Doesn’t work. Claw doesn’t open and coins don’t make it cut on. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for claw machine lovers
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 yr old daughter who LOVES claw machines and she loves it. You are able to put lots of different things as prizes and the quality is very good, better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Seleste

customer_reviews.title: Was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: We had to return the first one because it was broken. We got the second one very quickly but there were no plush toys in it.
customer_reviews.author: trusuthrngirl

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: “I like the grabber machine because it has lots of toys in it. And it has play coins and you get them back at the end. Easy to use.” -AJ, 6. Got it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Just remember it is not an expensive commercial machine
customer_reviews.text: It was a Birthday gift for my 9 year old granddaughter. She loved it! So did her 6 year old brother! Even the adults wanted to try! Using the right size prizes is key.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: This item says that it comes with 6 plush toys and there was no plush toys in the box. But yet I paid for something that was incomplete. I’m very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and it doesn’t work. I used the proper batteries, even traded them out, it never turned on
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even work. Son received for birthday and after we set it up, it didn’t even work’
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Broken...
customer_reviews.text: This item broke the 3rd day of using it. Never was able to return. Not pleased at all.... this was a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: J.W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift For my Girls
customer_reviews.text: I buy it for my baby girls. He just fall in love in this machine. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Liebenguth Serge

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Given to my niece who is 7 for Christmas and she loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and he loves it! It was a little difficult to put together but we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Stallone

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase loads of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. Would definitely recommend if you have kids that love these machines.
customer_reviews.author: Gelik

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Biggest hit on Christmas morning kids played with it all day over everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not work!! Do not buy this. It’s a cheap piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old nephew and he loves it especially the arcade noise!

customer_reviews.title: great claw machine
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, machine is great for small items.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work our kids are very disappointed. Will be returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! Great value, easy to use! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great fun
customer_reviews.text: What a cool fun product!! My kids love it! Its great that it comes with the coins and toys so its not an added purchase. Its all inclusive. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Etna The Claw Toy Grabber Machine with Lights & Sounds - Electronic Claw Toy Grabber Machine, Animation, 6 Animal Plush & Authentic Arcade Sounds for Exciting Play – with Volume Control Switch
product_meta.description: Updated model The claw toy grabber machine with flashing lights, sound control switch and 6 animal plush bring your favorite arcade game to your home with the claw! The electronic candy grabber machine allows you to bring the thrill of catching your own prize to your home. Simply set your eyes on the prize and adjust the joystick to win the prize of your choice. Win all types of prizes. See what you can grab with the claw. Test your skills by filling the claw with plush animals (6 included), scoop candy, gum, small toys, or other prizes of your choice, then use the controls to move the grabbing mechanism forward, backward, left, right, up and down. Can you grab a prize before the music stops? A successful try is rewarded with a prize that drops out of the chute to the sound of Applause and music. Plays music animation sounds while you use the controls to move the grabbing mechanism back and forth, up and down! Parents can fill "the claw" Candy grabber arcade game with all types of prizes - plush animal, candy, gum or small toys. Everybody wants to play some rounds, doesn't matter if young or old* includes: electronic claw toy grabber machine, flashing lights, authentic arcade sounds, volume control switch (off - Low - high), 30 arcade tokens, 6 plush animals. * requires 3 "D" Batteries (not included). Measures 10"L x 8"W x 13. 5"H. * makes an amazing and unique gift. Hours of fun* ages 3+
feature_bullets: The claw machine: kids of all ages are drawn to crane games at supermarkets, carnivals, and fairs. You can now bring that fun to your home with the carnival crane game Playset! Use the included tokens or your own Pennies to activate the crane and scoop candy, gum, small toys, small plush animals, or other prizes of your choice.

Imaginative play: encourage creativity, build fine motor skills, and stimulate narrative play with this super cool Playset. Keep the prizes that you win, or place them back in the machine for unlimited fun!

Authentic arcade flashing lights & sounds: with this classic game, a successful try is rewarded with a prize that drops out of the chute to the realistic flashing lights & Sound of Applause and music. The sound effects create an authentic carnival atmosphere where ever you choose to play!

Game: use the included tokens or your own Pennies to activate the crane. Use the controls to move the grabbing mechanism back and forth, right and left, up and down. Plays musical sounds & animation with flashing lights while you use the controls & try to grab & win a plush animal (6 included), scoop candy, gum, small toys, or other prizes of your choice.

Updated model now includes – flashing lights, volume control switch, 3 settings - off - low - high and 6 animal plush prizes. Can be reused over and over with toy or candy alike - claw measures: 13. 5"H x 8"W x 10"L - you must install brand new batteries and all batteries should match takes 3 "D" Batteries (not included). - makes an amazing and unique gift.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars275 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
